resources.string: King Tommen\'s cat\'s name was Ser Ponce
The name of the insurgent group who fight against Daenerys\' rule in Meereen are Sons of the Meereen
The battle between Jon Snow and Ramsay Bolton is known as the Battle of the Bastards
What type of cake Sansa Stark is especially fond of is lemon
The final line of Tyrion\'s speech at the Blackwater was : Hey, Ho! Let\'s go!
Gendry\'s chosen weapon is a sword
The name of the song that famously accompanies the Red Wedding is The Rains of Casamere
The seat of House Lannister is The Red Keep.
Samwell Tarly\'s brother is named Rickon
The character responsible for resurrecting Beric Dondarrion is Thoros of Myr
The High Sparrow\'s previous profession was a farmer
Daenerys Targaryen eventually hatches her dragon eggs at a bonfire.
The phrase \'Valar Morghulis\' means \'all men must serve\'
